sqlMap.select:
select count(1) totcnt from ismcum030 a where 1 = 1
a.shopmallname LIKE '%' #search_key1# '%'

select a.cum030id, a.cum010id, b.coname, a.shopmallname, a.shopurl, a.shopuid, a.shoppwd, a.uploadtype, a.uploadgubun, (select count(distinct uploaddate) from ismodl010 where uploaddate >= SUBDATE(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR) and cum030id = a.cum030id) as uploadCnt, (select max(uploaddate) from ismodl010 where cum030id = a.cum030id) as lastUploadDate from ismcum030 a, ismcum010 b where a.cum010id = b.cum010id and a.useyn = 'Y' and b.useyn = 'Y'
a.shopmallname LIKE '%' #search_key1# '%'
#search_filename# like concat('%',a.uploadtype,'%') and a.uploadgubun = 'M'
order by $orderbyclause$ limit #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#
select a.cum030id, a.additem, a.isassign, a.orderfield from ismodo010 a where a.cum030id = #cum030id#
select a.cum030id, a.apiurl, a.apicontext, a.apiversion from ismodo020 a where a.cum030id = #cum030id#
sqlMap.insert: insert into ismodo020 (cum030id, apiurl, apicontext, apiversion) values (#cum030id#, #apiurl#, #apicontext#, #apiversion#)
sqlMap.update: update ismodo020 set apiurl = #apiurl#, apicontext = #apicontext#, apiversion = #apiversion# where cum030id = #cum030id#
sqlMap.insert: insert into ismodo010 (cum030id, additem, isassign, orderfield) values (#cum030id#, #additem#, #isassign#, #orderfield#)

insert into ismodm010 ( orderno, orderdate, cum010id, cum030id, byc010id, orderuser, orderusercontact, rcvuser, rcvusercontact, orderitemid, orderitemopt, orderitemqty, orderitembyprice, postno, address, dlvmemo, dlvbyprice, dlvno, dlvco, dlvstatus, processdate, accountcum, accountbuy, status, cstype, uploadfilename, uploadviewkey, claimstatus, claimreason, retstatus, retqty, retprice, orderitemname, orderitemprice, dlvprice, rcvusercontacthp, rcvuseremail ) values ( #orderno#, #orderdate#, #cum010id#, #cum030id#, #byc010id#, #orderuser#, #orderusercontact#, #rcvuser#, #rcvusercontact#, #orderitemid#, #orderitemopt#, #orderitemqty#, #orderitembyprice#, #postno#, #address#, #dlvmemo#, #dlvbyprice#, #dlvno#, #dlvco#, #dlvstatus#, #processdate#, #accountcum#, #accountbuy#, #status#, #cstype#, #uploadfilename#, #uploadviewkey#,#claimstatus#, #claimreason#, #retstatus#, #retqty#, #retprice#, IFNULL(IF(#orderitemname# = '', (select a.itemname from ismprd010 a where a.itemcode = #orderitemid#), #orderitemname#),''), IFNULL(IF(#orderitemprice# = '', (select a.itemprice from ismprd010 a where a.itemcode = #orderitemid#), #orderitemprice#),''), IFNULL(IF(#dlvprice# = '', (select a.itemdlvprice from ismprd010 a where a.itemcode = #orderitemid#), #dlvprice#),''), #rcvusercontacthp#, #rcvuseremail# )

insert into ismodl010 (cum010id, cum030id, uploaddate, uploadviewkey) values
(#[].cum010id#, #[].cum030id#, #[].uploaddate#, #[].uploadviewkey#)
sqlMap.select:
select count(1) totcnt from ismodm010 a left outer join ismprd010 d on a.orderitemid = d.itemcode left outer join ismbyc010 e on d.byc010id = e.byc010id left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE f on a.status = f.CODE and f.CODE_ID = 'ISM050'
left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE j on a.claimstatus = j.CODE and j.CODE_ID = 'ISM060' left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE k on a.claimreason = k.CODE and k.CODE_ID = 'ISM070' left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE l on a.retstatus = l.CODE and l.CODE_ID = 'ISM080',
ismcum010 b, LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE c, ismcum030 g, LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE h, LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE i where a.cum010id = b.cum010id and a.cum030id = g.cum030id and b.cotype1 = c.CODE and c.CODE_ID = 'ISM020' and b.cotype2 = h.CODE and h.CODE_ID in ('ISM031','ISM032') and b.cotype3 = i.CODE and i.CODE_ID in ('ISM041','ISM042','ISM043','ISM044')
a.uploadviewkey LIKE '%' #search_key1# '%'
a.odm010id = #odm010id#
a.status = ''
a.status = #search_status#
a.cstype = #search_cstype#
IF(a.orderdate = '', curdate(), DATE_ADD(a.orderdate, INTERVAL 0 DAY)) >= DATE_ADD(concat(#dtSearch_frOrderDt#,' 00:00:00'), INTERVAL 0 DAY)
IF(a.orderdate = '', curdate(), DATE_ADD(a.orderdate, INTERVAL 0 DAY)) <= DATE_ADD(concat(#dtSearch_toOrderDt#,' 23:59:59'), INTERVAL 0 DAY)
b.cotype1 = #dtSearch_cumType1#
e.bycname LIKE '%' #dtSearch_bycNm# '%'
b.coname LIKE '%' #dtSearch_cumNm# '%'
a.dlvno LIKE '%' #dtSearch_dlvNo# '%'
a.dlvco LIKE '%' #dtSearch_dlvCo# '%'
a.orderno LIKE '%' #dtSearch_orderno# '%'
a.orderitemid LIKE '%' #dtSearch_orderItemid# '%'
a.orderitemname LIKE '%' #dtSearch_orderItemName# '%'
a.rcvuser LIKE '%' #dtSearch_rcvUser# '%'
a.rcvusercontact LIKE '%' #dtSearch_rcvuserContact# '%'
a.orderuser LIKE '%' #dtSearch_orderUser# '%'
concat(IFNULL(c.code_nm,''),IFNULL(e.bycname,''),b.coname,IFNULL(a.dlvno,''),IFNULL(a.dlvco,''),IFNULL(a.orderno,''),IFNULL(a.orderitemid,''),IFNULL(a.orderitemname,''),IFNULL(a.rcvuser,''),IFNULL(a.rcvusercontact,''),IFNULL(a.orderuser,''),IFNULL(f.CODE_NM,'')) LIKE '%' #dtSearch_all# '%'
d.pristock = #poSearch_pristock# and IFNULL(d.itemgubun,'1') in ('2')
d.byc010id = #poSearch_byc010id# and IFNULL(d.itemgubun,'1') in ('1','3')

select a.odm010id, a.orderno, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(a.orderdate, INTERVAL 0 DAY) , '%Y-%m-%d') as orderdate, a.cum010id, a.cum030id, a.byc010id, a.orderuser, a.orderusercontact, a.rcvuser, a.rcvusercontact, a.orderitemid, a.orderitemopt, a.orderitemqty, a.orderitembyprice, a.postno, a.address, a.dlvmemo, a.dlvbyprice, a.dlvno, a.dlvco, a.dlvstatus, a.processdate, a.accountcum, a.accountbuy, a.status, a.cstype, a.uploadfilename, a.uploadviewkey, a.claimstatus, a.claimreason, a.retstatus, a.retqty, a.retprice, IFNULL(IF(IFNULL(a.orderitemname,'') = '', d.itemname, a.orderitemname),'') as orderitemname, IFNULL(IF(IFNULL(a.orderitemprice,'') = '', d.itemprice, a.orderitemprice),'') as orderitemprice, IFNULL(IF(IFNULL(a.dlvprice,'') = '', d.itemdlvprice, a.dlvprice),'') as dlvprice, a.rcvusercontacthp, a.rcvuseremail, b.coname, c.code_nm, IFNULL(d.itemname,'') as itemname, IFNULL(d.itemprice,'0') as itemprice, IFNULL(d.itembuyprice,'0') as itembuyprice, IFNULL(d.itemdlvprice,'0') as itemdlvprice, IFNULL(d.itembuydlvprice,'0') as itembuydlvprice, IFNULL(e.bycname,'') as bycname, f.CODE_NM as ststusNm, g.shopmallname, h.code_nm as cotype2nm, i.code_nm as cotype3nm, IFNULL(j.code_nm,'') as claimstatusnm, IFNULL(k.code_nm,'') as claimreasonnm, IFNULL(l.code_nm,'') as retstatusnm from ismodm010 a left outer join ismprd010 d on a.orderitemid = d.itemcode left outer join ismbyc010 e on d.byc010id = e.byc010id left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE f on a.status = f.CODE and f.CODE_ID = 'ISM050'
left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE j on a.claimstatus = j.CODE and j.CODE_ID = 'ISM060' left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE k on a.claimreason = k.CODE and k.CODE_ID = 'ISM070' left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE l on a.retstatus = l.CODE and l.CODE_ID = 'ISM080',
ismcum010 b, LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE c, ismcum030 g, LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE h, LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE i where a.cum010id = b.cum010id and a.cum030id = g.cum030id and b.cotype1 = c.CODE and c.CODE_ID = 'ISM020' and b.cotype2 = h.CODE and h.CODE_ID in ('ISM031','ISM032') and b.cotype3 = i.CODE and i.CODE_ID in ('ISM041','ISM042','ISM043','ISM044')
a.uploadviewkey LIKE '%' #search_key1# '%'
a.odm010id = #odm010id#
a.status = ''
a.status = #search_status#
a.cstype = #search_cstype#
IF(a.orderdate = '', curdate(), DATE_ADD(a.orderdate, INTERVAL 0 DAY)) >= DATE_ADD(concat(#dtSearch_frOrderDt#,' 00:00:00'), INTERVAL 0 DAY)
IF(a.orderdate = '', curdate(), DATE_ADD(a.orderdate, INTERVAL 0 DAY)) <= DATE_ADD(concat(#dtSearch_toOrderDt#,' 23:59:59'), INTERVAL 0 DAY)
b.cotype1 = #dtSearch_cumType1#
e.bycname LIKE '%' #dtSearch_bycNm# '%'
b.coname LIKE '%' #dtSearch_cumNm# '%'
a.dlvno LIKE '%' #dtSearch_dlvNo# '%'
a.dlvco LIKE '%' #dtSearch_dlvCo# '%'
a.orderno LIKE '%' #dtSearch_orderno# '%'
a.orderitemid LIKE '%' #dtSearch_orderItemid# '%'
a.orderitemname LIKE '%' #dtSearch_orderItemName# '%'
a.rcvuser LIKE '%' #dtSearch_rcvUser# '%'
a.rcvusercontact LIKE '%' #dtSearch_rcvuserContact# '%'
a.orderuser LIKE '%' #dtSearch_orderUser# '%'
concat(IFNULL(c.code_nm,''),IFNULL(e.bycname,''),b.coname,IFNULL(a.dlvno,''),IFNULL(a.dlvco,''),IFNULL(a.orderno,''),IFNULL(a.orderitemid,''),IFNULL(a.orderitemname,''),IFNULL(a.rcvuser,''),IFNULL(a.rcvusercontact,''),IFNULL(a.orderuser,''),IFNULL(f.CODE_NM,'')) LIKE '%' #dtSearch_all# '%'
d.pristock = #poSearch_pristock# and IFNULL(d.itemgubun,'1') in ('2')
d.byc010id = #poSearch_byc010id# and IFNULL(d.itemgubun,'1') in ('1','3')
order by b.coname, a.orderno, a.orderitemid limit #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#
sqlMap.update:
update ismodm010 set processdate = now()
status = #selectoptionval#
accountcum = #selectaccountcumval#
accountbuy = #selectaccountbuyval#
where odm010id in
#chgodm010ids[]#
sqlMap.delete:
delete from ismodm010 where odm010id in
#chgodm010ids[]#
sqlMap.update:
update ismodm010 set odm010id = odm010id
dlvprice = #dlvprice#
dlvno = #dlvno#
dlvmemo = #dlvmemo#
orderitemname = #orderitemname#
address = #address#
orderitemopt = #orderitemopt#
dlvco = #dlvco#
rcvuser = #rcvuser#
rcvusercontact = #rcvusercontact#
orderitemprice = #orderitemprice#
orderuser = #orderuser#
orderusercontact = #orderusercontact#
accountcum = #accountcum#
accountbuy = #accountbuy#
cstype = #cstype#
claimstatus = #claimstatus#
claimreason = #claimreason#
retstatus = #retstatus#
retqty = #retqty#
retprice = #retprice#
status = #status#, processdate = now()
rcvusercontacthp = #rcvusercontacthp#
rcvuseremail = #rcvuseremail#
where odm010id = #odm010id#
sqlMap.select: select o1.cum010id as cum010id, c1.coname as cum010name, o1.cum030id as cum030id, c3.shopmallname as cum030name, b.byc010id as byc010id, b.bycname as byc010name, sum(o1.orderitemprice) as itemprice, sum(p.itembuyprice) as itembuyprice from ismodm010 o1 left outer join ismcum010 c1 on c1.cum010id = o1.cum010id left outer join ismcum030 c3 on c3.cum030id = o1.cum030id left outer join ismprd010 p on p.itemcode = o1.orderitemid left outer join ismbyc010 b on b.byc010id = p.byc010id where o1.closedt LIKE '%' #yyyymm# '%' group by o1.cum030id, b.byc010id order by cum030id asc

select b.byc010id as byc010id, b.bycname as byc010name, sum(o1.orderitemprice) as itemprice from ismodm010 o1 left outer join ismprd010 p on p.itemcode = o1.orderitemid left outer join ismbyc010 b on b.byc010id = p.byc010id where o1.closedt LIKE '%' #yyyymm# '%' group by b.byc010id order by itemprice desc limit 10
